page.title: 12A TYPICAL DAY
page.content:
In the morning when I arrive at school I play with my friends until the bell goes. My lessons start at 9.00 a.m. I have different lessons every day. I finish school at 3.35 p.m. when I arrive home I change my clothes and do my homework. Then I have my tea. After my tea I play with my friends and then watch television.{Martin Youngman (12)
I get up in the morning, get washed, get dressed and have my breakfast. I go to school and after six lessons i have a lunch break. After that we have another four lessons then we go home. When I get home I do my homework, have my dinner and then go out to play or watch television. I have some supper then go to bed.{Katherine Balmer (12)
